quotes.text: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Try a little harder to be a little better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Dont struggle when youre all tangled up
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: going downhill is easy....its the uphill thats hard
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Love is made up of: Trust, Respect, Support, Commitment and Patience. If these 5 attributes exist, love will grow.
quotes.author: Dr Goodman

quotes.text: when life gets hard...just say so what
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: negatives are temporary, positives last forever
quotes.author: Dr. Goodman
